Round matrix by blocks

round_by_blocks.Rd

Applies round_matrix() to the blocks using apply_by_block().

Usage

round_by_blocks(Y, MARGIN, L, digits = 0)

Arguments

Y

Matrix

MARGIN

1 horizontal, 2 vertical.

L

Number of lines of the block.

digits

Number of decimal places to be rounded to.

On this page
